winget.name: Visual Studio Code

winget.name: Sublime 4
winget.description: Sublime Text is a sophisticated text editor for code, markup and prose. You'll love the slick user interface, extraordinary features and amazing performance.

winget.description: Sublime Text is a sophisticated text editor for code, markup and prose. You'll love the slick user interface, extraordinary features and amazing performance.

winget.description: Notepad++ is a free source code editor and Notepad replacement that supports several languages. Running in the MS Windows environment, its use is governed by GPL License.

winget.name: Brackets
winget.description: With focused visual tools and preprocessor support, Brackets is a modern text editor that makes it easy to design in the browser. It's crafted from the ground up for web designers and front-end developers.

winget.name: Vim
winget.description: Vim is a highly configurable text editor built to make creating and changing any kind of text very efficient. It is included as "vi" with most UNIX systems and with Apple OS X.

winget.name: Neovim
winget.description: Neovim is a fork of the venerable text editor Vim, focused on extensibility and usability. It is not a rewrite but a continuation and extension of Vim. Many clones and derivatives exist, some very cleverâ€”but none are Vim. Neovim is built for users who want the good parts of Vim, and more. See :help nvim-from-vim for more details.

winget.name: Bluefish
winget.description: Bluefish is a powerful editor targeted towards programmers and webdesigners, with many options to write websites, scripts and programming code. Bluefish supports many programming and markup languages.

winget.name: Visual Studio Community 2019
winget.description: Visual Studio Community 2019 is a free, fully-featured, extensible, and cross-platform IDE for creating modern applications for Android, iOS, Windows, as well as web applications and cloud services.

winget.name: Visual Studio Professional 2019
winget.description: Visual Studio Professional 2019 is a fully-featured, extensible, and cross-platform IDE for creating modern applications for Android, iOS, Windows, as well as web applications and cloud services.

winget.name: Visual Studio Community 2022
winget.description: Visual Studio Community 2022 is a free, fully-featured, extensible, and cross-platform IDE for creating modern applications for Android, iOS, Windows, as well as web applications and cloud services.

winget.name: Visual Studio Professional 2022
winget.description: Visual Studio Professional 2022 is a fully-featured, extensible, and cross-platform IDE for creating modern applications for Android, iOS, Windows, as well as web applications and cloud services.

winget.name: PSpad editor
winget.description: PSpad is a programmer's editor with support for multiple syntax highlighting profiles. It offers a variety of features that allow you to edit HTML, PHP, Perl, C, C++, Java, JavaScript, VBScript, Python, Ruby, CSS, ASP, SQL, Delphi, Pascal, Batch, C#, XML, Ini files and user defined languages.

winget.name: WebStorm
winget.description: WebStorm is a powerful IDE for JavaScript, TypeScript, CSS and HTML. It provides smart code completion, on-the-fly error detection, and powerful navigation and refactoring for JavaScript, TypeScript, CSS and HTML. It also provides intelligent code assistance for Node.js, React, Angular, Vue.js, and many other frameworks.

winget.name: CLion
winget.description: CLion is a cross-platform IDE for C and C++ development. It provides a complete set of tools for C and C++ development. CLion looks beyond just syntax highlighting and autocomplete to provide smart coding assistance for C and C++.

winget.name: IntelliJ IDEA Community Edition
winget.description: IntelliJ IDEA Community Edition is a free and open-source IDE for Java, Scala, Groovy, and other JVM-based programming languages. It provides smart code completion, on-the-fly error detection, and powerful navigation and refactoring for Java, Scala, Groovy, and other JVM-based languages.

winget.name: IntelliJ IDEA Ultimate Edition
winget.description: IntelliJ IDEA Ultimate Edition is a paid and commercial IDE for Java, Scala, Groovy, and other JVM-based programming languages. It provides smart code completion, on-the-fly error detection, and powerful navigation and refactoring for Java, Scala, Groovy, and other JVM-based languages.

winget.name: PhpStorm
winget.description: PhpStorm is a cross-platform IDE for PHP, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript development. It provides smart code completion, on-the-fly error detection, and powerful navigation and refactoring for PHP, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

winget.name: PyCharm Professional Edition
winget.description: PyCharm Professional Edition is a paid and commercial IDE for Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and other web development languages. It provides smart code completion, on-the-fly error detection, and powerful navigation and refactoring for Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and other web development languages.

winget.name: GoLand

winget.name: Windows Terminal
winget.description: Windows Terminal is a new, modern, fast, efficient, powerful, and productive terminal application for users of command-line tools and shells like Command Prompt, PowerShell, and WSL.

winget.name: PowerShell 7
winget.description: PowerShell is a cross-platform (Windows, Linux, and macOS) automation and configuration tool/framework that works well with your existing tools and is optimized for dealing with structured data (e.g. JSON, CSV, XML, etc.), REST APIs, and object models. It includes a command-line shell, an associated scripting language and a framework for processing cmdlets.

winget.name: Hyper
winget.description: Hyper is a terminal built on web technologies.

winget.name: Nu
winget.description: Nu is a shell written in Rust. It is a modern shell that is designed to be easier to use and more powerful than other shells.

winget.name: WezTerm

winget.name: ConEmu

winget.name: WireGuard
winget.description: WireGuard is an extremely simple yet fast and modern VPN that utilizes state-of-the-art cryptography. It aims to be faster, simpler, leaner, and more useful than IPsec, while avoiding the massive headache. It intends to be considerably more performant than OpenVPN. WireGuard is designed as a general purpose VPN for running on embedded interfaces and super computers alike, fit for many different circumstances. Initially released for the Linux kernel, it is now cross-platform (Windows, macOS, BSD, iOS, Android) and widely deployable. It is currently under heavy development, but already it might be regarded as the most secure, easiest to use, and simplest VPN solution in the industry.

winget.name: OpenVPN

winget.name: ExpressVPN

winget.name: Mullvad VPN

winget.name: NordVPN
winget.description: NordVPN encrypts your internet traffic and hides your IP and physical location. Works on 6 devices at once, on every major platform. With NordVPN, encrypt your online activity to protect your private data from hackers or snoopy advertisers. Enjoy global connectivity along with high-performance speed and secure access to streaming websites, censored content and social networks.
